title: Lemon pistachio courgette cake
ingredients: ['450g plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '4 eggs', '300g caster sugar', '235ml vegetable oil', '120g plain yogurt', '1 small lemon, zested', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '225g grated courgette', '130g chopped pistachio nuts']
